# Potent Hex (Feat)
## Overview
You have developed more powerful hexes.

**Prerequisite:** Hex class feature.

**Benefit:** You gain a +1 bonus to the DC of all your hexes.

**Source:** Advanced Feats: The Witch's Brew (Kobold Press), pg.
